name: Dream Guardian
description:
Dream Guardian is a 2D platform in which the main character has to protect

dreams from nightmare creatures. The protagonist, Yume, the dream guardian

has the ability to use "dream sand" and he can shape it in several forms –

whips, swords, bows etc.- to fight against enemies and surpass obstacles. The

particular nature of dreams is the key of Dream Guardian gameplay indeed, it

offers the chance to create very different levels, mixing fantasy with reality.

Through different puzzles and particular enemies, Yume will learn new

abilities fundamental to overcome particular situations.
